name: More TV Characters Quiz | Name The Show | 10 Questions

questions.text: Doug Lawrence, Annie Cooper, Letitia Lawrence
questions.explanation:
Family.

	This prime time drama aired from 1976-1980.  It focused around the lives of the Lawrence family.  Starring James Broderick as the father of the family (Doug) and Sada Thompson (Kate) as the mother.  Kristy McNichol also starred as Letitia better known as Buddy Lawrence.

questions.text: Eustace Charleton Haney, Hank Kimball, Sam Drucker
questions.explanation:
Green Acres.

	This sitcom aired from 1965-1971 and starred Eddie Albert and Eva Gabor as two city folk trying to live in a rural community.

questions.text: Charles Moore,  Darlene Merriman, Alan Pinkard
questions.explanation:
Head of the Class.

	This sitcom starred Howard Hesseman as Charles Moore assigned to take over the Individual Honors Program at Millard Fillmore High School.  Hesseman left the show in 1990 and Billy Connolly was the new teacher, Billy MacGregor.  The show aired from 1986-1991.

questions.text: Lucas McCain,  Marshal Micah Torrance, Hattie Denton
questions.explanation:
The Rifleman.

	Chuck Connors starred as Lucas McCain, a widower raising his son Mark (Johnny Crawford) in a small town in New Mexico. When trouble came to town, McCain was there to stop it. This popular western aired from 1958-1963.

questions.text: Shawn Hunter, Topanga Lawrence, George Feeney
questions.explanation:
Boy Meets World.

	Ben Savage starred as Cory Matthews, an intelligent and often mischievous boy in this sitcom that focused on his family and friends.  Co-starring Rider Strong as his best friend Shawn and Danielle Fishel as Topanga, his friend/girlfriend/wife. The show aired from 1993-2000.

questions.text: Constable Odo Ital, Gul Dukat, Jake Sisko
questions.explanation:
Star Trek: Deep Space Nine.

	This sci-fi series (the third of the 'Star Trek' series) took place at a Federation space station orbiting a remote planet in the newly liberated Bajoran region of space.  This show aired from 1993-1999.

questions.text: Donna Stone,  Dr. Dave Kelsey,  Mrs. Wilgus
questions.explanation:
The Donna Reed Show.

	Donna Reed starred as the mother of the Stone family, a perfect TV family.  Her husband Alex (Carl Betz) was a peditrician and they had two perfect children Mary and Jeff (Shelly Fabares and Paul Peterson).  This sitcom aired from 1958-1966.

questions.text: Michael Taylor, Joey Harris, Nicole Bradford
questions.explanation:
My Two Dads.

	This sitcom was about Nicole (Staci Keanan) and the two men in her life Michael (Paul Reiser) and Joey (Greg Evigan) who both claimed to be her father.  Also co-starring Florence Stanley as Judge Wilbur, the Judge who awarded both Michael and Joey custody of Nicole.  The show aired from 1987-1990.

Highway to Heaven.

	Michael Landon starred as a guardian angel (Jonathan Smith) who returned to Earth to help people.  Victor French played Mark Gordon, an ex-cop who became Jonathan's assistant.  This drama aired from 1984-1989.

questions.text: Murray Slaughter, Phyllis Lindstrom, Ted Baxter
questions.explanation:
The Mary Tyler Moore Show.

	Mary Tyler Moore starred as Mary Richards, a single woman working in a local TV news station.  It focused around Mary, but there were so many great characters in this sitcom that made this show one of the funniest sitcoms ever made (in my opinion).  It aired from 1970-1977
